languages.text: "Я сократила в проповедях менее значимые куски, посвященные святым, и уделила больше внимания объяснениям божественной природы Вашей Светлости, хозя{mf|ина|йки} {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Патента{/g}, распоряжающ{mf|егося|ейся} нашими судьбами". {n}Исповедница угодливо улыбается.{/n}

"I have shortened some less significant parts of my sermons, such as the ones that talked about all the various saints, and instead put a greater focus on explaining Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s divine nature as the {mf|master|mistress} of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} who commands our destinies." {n}The confessor smiles obsequiously.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я сократила в проповедях менее значимые куски, посвященные святым, и уделила больше внимания объяснениям божественной природы Вашей Светлости, хозя{mf|ина|йки} {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Патента{/g}, распоряжающ{mf|егося|ейся} нашими судьбами". {n}Исповедница угодливо улыбается.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich habe einige weniger wichtige Teile meiner Predigten wie die Nennung der verschiedenen Heiligen gekürzt und konzentriere mich stattdessen auf die Beschreibung des göttlichen Wesens Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} als {mf|Meister|Meisterin} des {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Handelsbriefs{/g}, {mf|der|die} über unser Schicksal bestimmt." {n}Die Konfessorin lächelt unterwürfig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have shortened some less significant parts of my sermons, such as the ones that talked about all the various saints, and instead put a greater focus on explaining Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s divine nature as the {mf|master|mistress} of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} who commands our destinies." {n}The confessor smiles obsequiously.{/n}

languages.text: « J'ai fait l'impasse sur certaines sections moins intéressantes de mon sermon, comme celles qui parlaient des différents saints. J'ai préféré mettre l'accent sur la nature divine de Votre Seigneurie en tant que {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}lettre de marque{/g} qui commande à nos destinées. »{n}La confesseuse sourit avec servilité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have shortened some less significant parts of my sermons, such as the ones that talked about all the various saints, and instead put a greater focus on explaining Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s divine nature as the {mf|master|mistress} of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} who commands our destinies." {n}The confessor smiles obsequiously.{/n}

J'ai préféré mettre l'accent sur la nature divine de Votre Seigneurie en tant que {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la lettre de marque qui commande à nos destinées. »{n}La confesseuse sourit avec servilité.{/n}

« J'ai fait l'impasse sur certaines sections moins intéressantes de mon sermon, comme celles qui parlaient des différents saints. J'ai préféré mettre l'accent sur la nature divine de Votre Seigneurie en tant que {mf|détenteur|détentrice} de la lettre de marque qui commande à nos destinées. »{n}La confesseuse sourit avec servilité.{/n}

languages.text: «He resumido algunas partes menos importantes de mis sermones, como las que hablan de los diversos santos, para centrarme en explicar la naturaleza divina de mi{mf|lord|lady}, {mf|el|la} am{mf|o|a} de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Patente{/g}, que dirige nuestros destinos». {n}La confesora sonríe, obsequiosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have shortened some less significant parts of my sermons, such as the ones that talked about all the various saints, and instead put a greater focus on explaining Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s divine nature as the {mf|master|mistress} of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} who commands our destinies." {n}The confessor smiles obsequiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «He resumido algunas partes menos importantes de mis sermones, como las que hablan de los diversos santos, para centrarme en explicar la naturaleza divina de mi{mf|lord|lady}, {mf|el|la} am{mf|o|a} de la Patente, que dirige nuestros destinos». {n}La confesora sonríe, obsequiosa.{/n}

languages.text: 「私の説教では、さまざまな聖人についての話など、余り重要でない部分を短く切り上げ、代わりに私たちの運命を司る{g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}令状{/g}の主として、陛下の神聖について説明することに重点を置きました」{n}聴罪師は、へつらうように笑う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have shortened some less significant parts of my sermons, such as the ones that talked about all the various saints, and instead put a greater focus on explaining Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s divine nature as the {mf|master|mistress} of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} who commands our destinies." {n}The confessor smiles obsequiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私の説教では、さまざまな聖人についての話など、余り重要でない部分を短く切り上げ、代わりに私たちの運命を司る令状の主として、陛下の神聖について説明することに重点を置きました」{n}聴罪師は、へつらうように笑う。{/n}

languages.text: “我缩短了布道中某些不太重要的部分，比如谈论那些圣徒的部分。同时，我将布道的重点放在了分析您的神性方面。毕竟，您是{g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}授状{/g}的主人，我们所有人的命运都掌握在您的手中。”{n}告解神父露出了谄媚的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have shortened some less significant parts of my sermons, such as the ones that talked about all the various saints, and instead put a greater focus on explaining Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s divine nature as the {mf|master|mistress} of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} who commands our destinies." {n}The confessor smiles obsequiously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我缩短了布道中某些不太重要的部分，比如谈论那些圣徒的部分。同时，我将布道的重点放在了分析您的神性方面。毕竟，您是授状的主人，我们所有人的命运都掌握在您的手中。”{n}告解神父露出了谄媚的微笑。{/n}
“我缩短了布道中某些不太重要的部分，比如谈论那些圣徒的部分。同时，我将布道的重点放在了分析您的神性方面。毕竟，您是授状的主人，我们所有人的命运都掌握在您的手中。”{n}告解神父露出了谄媚的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: "Vaazlarımın, çeşitli azizlerden bahsedenler gibi daha az önemli olan bazı bölümlerini kısalttım ve onun yerine {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Ruhsatname'nin{/g} kaderlerimize hükmeden efendisi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin ilahi tabiatını anlatmaya daha fazla odaklandım." {n}Günah çıkarıcı dalkavukça gülüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I have shortened some less significant parts of my sermons, such as the ones that talked about all the various saints, and instead put a greater focus on explaining Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s divine nature as the {mf|master|mistress} of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarrantGlossary}Warrant{/g} who commands our destinies." {n}The confessor smiles obsequiously.{/n}
